name: Raze satchel ability from Valorant
description:
Controls : Arrow Keys, mouse for looking around, left click for the stachel (bomb)

Its just the statchel mechanic that the character "Raze" from Riot Game's Valorant has made.  I just love the agent and that satchel mechanic is my favorite part of the whole game, it makes movement way more interesting than just having a dash.

This is only a small prototype/study I wanted to make in Unreal Engine 4.
